number of decimals in the underlying token","maturity":"the maturity of the market","maximumDebt":"the maximum amount of debt/bonds to allow to be minted","price":"the issuance price on the bonds (a decimal stored as a base 1e18 uint256, issuance accurate to 8 digits precision)","underlying":"the address of the underlying token "}},"mint(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"the amount of underlying tokens to lend","maturity":"the maturity of the market","underlying":"the address of the underlying token being lent"}},"redeem(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"the amount of underlying tokens to redeem and bond tokens to burn","maturity":"the maturity of the market being redeemed","underlying":"the address of the underlying token being redeemed"}},"repay(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"the amount of underlying token debt to pay","maturity":"the maturity of the market being redeemed","underlying":"the address of the underlying token being paid"}},"transferAdmin(address)":{"params":{"newAdmin":"Address of the new admin"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"createMarket(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8,string,string)":{"notice":"Can be called to create a new debt market for a given underlying token"},"markets(address,uint256)":{"notice":"A mapping of markets that have been created address the address of the underlying token uint256 the maturity (unix timestamp) of the market"},"mint(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Can be called to mint/purchase a new bond"},"redeem(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Can be called after maturity to redeem debt owed"},"repay(address,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Can be called to pay towards a certain market's debt (generally called by the debtor)"},"transferAdmin(address)":{"notice":"Allows the admin to set a new
